description: new submission! finally, This is the new revision of Metropolis - Part I: “The Miracle and the Sleeper” after 3 years! Changes: new tempo changes to make the song length nine minutes and thirty-two seconds. Gotten rid of unnecessary harmonies and guitar tracks. Added more keyboard sounds to match the studio
title: Metropolis Part 1 The Miracle And The Sleeper

description: Sorry about that, this is my first submitting my file in Songster. It should have the right sounds. This is the new revision of Metropolis - Part I: “The Miracle and the Sleeper” after 3 years! Changes: new tempo changes to make the song length nine minutes and thirty-two seconds. Gotten rid of unnecessary harmonies and guitar tracks. Added more keyboard sounds to match the studio if there the wrong sounds, I will fix them. That's about it.
title: Metropolis Part 1 The Miracle And The Sleeper
